name: @custom-js/sdhk-js
description: This is official TypeScript/JavaScript SDK for the CustomJS API.

scripts.test: npm run build && node --test --import tsx test/client.test.ts test/html2pdf.test.ts test/markdown2pdf.test.ts test/screenshot.test.ts test/scraper.test.ts
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && cp README_DIST.md dist/README.md
